prompts: Create an electric-type Pokemon with a sleek, humanoid design and glowing, spiky features.
I want a Pokemon that embodies the essence of lightning, with vibrant colors and a dynamic pose.
Generate a character that looks like a walking power line, with electrifying accents and a unique body shape.
Make a Pokemon that has a futuristic vibe, reflecting its electric nature with metallic elements.
Imagine a creature that channels electricity, with wild hair and a playful yet fierce demeanor.
Design a Pokemon inspired by circuits and energy, featuring bright colors and an energetic stance.
Show me a Pokemon that looks like a living electrical storm, with crackling features and a striking presence.

distinctive_features: Long, thin arms with claw-like hands
Glowing yellow accents on the body
